mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID AS contentId, USER_ID AS userId, DATE_CREATED AS dateCreated, TEXT AS text, LAST_UPDATED AS lastUpdated, FILE_ID AS fileId, RECOMMEND AS recommendCnt, TITLE AS title FROM CONTENT WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTENT (USER_ID, TITLE, DATE_CREATED, TEXT, LAST_UPDATED, FILE_ID) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{dateCreated}, #{text, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{lastUpdated}, #{fileId} )
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID AS contentId, USER_ID AS userId, TITLE AS title, DATE_CREATED AS dateCreated, TEXT AS text, LAST_UPDATED AS lastUpdated, FILE_ID AS fileId, RECOMMEND AS recommendCnt FROM CONTENT ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONTENT_ID AS contentId, USER_ID AS userId, TITLE AS title, DATE_CREATED AS dateCreated, TEXT AS text, LAST_UPDATED AS lastUpdated, FILE_ID AS fileId, RECOMMEND AS recommendCnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC) AS rnum FROM CONTENT ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
